The austere classroom had bare white walls and rows of wooden desks. Professor Stone, wearing his usual gray suit, wrote equations on the blackboard with precise movements. A single potted cactus sat on the windowsill, its spiky form echoing the uncompromising atmosphere. Yet in this simplicity, students found perfect clarity for learning.

draw_prompt: A minimalist classroom with bare gray walls, three wooden benches in muted brown, and a black chalkboard. A strict-looking teacher in crisp beige shirt stands perfectly upright, hands clasped behind back, under harsh fluorescent lighting. Sharp lines, desaturated colors, no decorations.
